main event: An Air Force pilot reported sighting two unidentified flying objects near Mount Pleasant, Utah on July 21, 1949.
interesting points: The sighting occurred during a head-on approach while the aircraft was at an altitude of 11,000 feet,The pilot was the only witness as crew members did not see the objects,The objects reportedly had excessive speed compared to the aircraft,The objects were described as silver or white and were sighted for approximately 3 seconds,No photographs or sketches of the objects were available.
witness description: 2nd Lieutenant (pilot) of the 1st Strategic Support Squadron, Bergstrom Air Force Base, Texas
